rules.description: Rule Code: DEF-001xFxx Deferral Health Change This sends a notification to the At Risk team to alert them about any changes in Deferral Health.
Rule Code: DEF-002xFxx Update_Projected_End_Date_Amendment Updates Projected End Date If an amendment is being processed
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Pending_Amendment_Date__c), Pending_Amendment_Date__c > RD_Projected_End_Date__c, OR( ISPICKVAL(Deferral_Status__c,"In Process"), ISPICKVAL(Deferral_Status__c,"On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Deferral_Status__c,"Pending Close Approval") ) )

rules.description: Rule Code: DEF-003xFxx Update_Health_Amendment Updates Health Status If an amendment is being processed
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Pending_Amendment_Date__c), Pending_Amendment_Date__c > RD_Projected_End_Date__c, ISPICKVAL(Health_Status__c,"Green"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Deferral_Status__c,"In Process"), ISPICKVAL(Deferral_Status__c,"On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Deferral_Status__c,"Pending Close Approval") ) )
